description: In wlan, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07796900; Issue ID: ALPS07796900.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Android 12.0, 13.0 / Yocto 4.0 / Iot-Yocto 22.2 / Linux 4.19 (For MT5221 only)
